Name: Phantom Pain Cage
DetailDesc:
Challenge various bosses in the game. 2 Novice bosses and 3 Intermediate/Advanced bosses are spawned each week.
Kill bosses to earn Progress. Progress rewards are automatically earned when you reach requirements.
Resets at 07:00 UTC every Monday.
You receive a reward based on your ranking every Monday.
Incomplete stages cannot be attempted if Construct Stamina is at 0. Stamina recovers at each reset.
You can challenge up to 4 bosses each day.
